content.en: Intelligent manufacturing algorithms: Researchers have been exploring the use of algorithms in multi-agent systems to improve various aspects of manufacturing. These algorithms provide computer assistance during the design, validation, and implementation of multi-agent systems, enabling manufacturing integration, facilitating intelligent manufacturing in dynamic environments, supporting manufacturing control and scheduling, and improving decision-making in the chemical process industry. The goal is to create robust and responsive control in manufacturing, enable dynamically integrated manufacturing systems, and optimize scheduling and decision-making processes. However, there are still engineering problems that need to be addressed for wider industrial implementation of these intelligent agent technologies.
content.da: Intelligente fremstillingsalgoritmer: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af algoritmer i multi-agentsystemer for at forbedre forskellige aspekter af fremstilling. Disse algoritmer giver computerassistance under design, validering og implementering af multi-agentsystemer, hvilket muliggør fremstillingsintegration, fremmer intelligent fremstilling i dynamiske miljøer, understøtter fremstillingskontrol og planlægning samt forbedrer beslutningstagning i den kemiske procesindustri. Målet er at skabe robust og responsiv kontrol i fremstillingen, muliggøre dynamisk integrerede fremstillingssystemer og optimere planlægnings- og beslutningsprocesser. Der er dog stadig ingeniørmæssige problemer, der skal løses for en bredere industriel implementering af disse intelligente agentteknologier.
